name: Den
description: A cross platform housing search utility

scripts.install_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.install_location: cd _cordova && cordova plugin add org.apache.cordova.geolocation && cd ..
scripts.run_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova build && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.android: rm -Rf _cordova && npm run-script install_cordova && npm run-script install_android_cordova && npm run-script install_location && npm run-script cp_cordova && npm run-script run_android_cordova
scripts.compile-ts: cd src; find . -name "*.ts" | xargs ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs; cd ..
scripts.bundle-client: cd src/client; ../../node_modules/.bin/browserify main.js -t reactify -o static/js/main.js; cd ../..
scripts.make: npm run-script compile-ts && npm run-script bundle-client

author: Aaron Nech & Daniel Noteboom
